title: How to Make Sunny Side Down Eggs

steps.headline: Put 2 tbsp vegetable oil or butter on the frying pan while the heat is on.
After the oil or butter has been melted or what not, make sure it's all over the pan so it won't stick.
Crack the egg(s) open and make sure you crack the eggs lower to the pan or else the yolks will break.
Just as the whites are starting to turn white, turn the stove off and wait until the eggs are pure white and the yolk has a little bit of a skin over it.
Flip the egg over with a spatula gently.
After a minute or two, flip it over again gently.
Make toast to sweep up the yolk if you like.

text: Put 2 tbsp vegetable oil or butter on the frying pan while the heat is on.  After the oil or butter has been melted or what not, make sure it's all over the pan so it won't stick.  Crack the egg(s) open and make sure you crack the eggs lower to the pan or else the yolks will break.  Just as the whites are starting to turn white, turn the stove off and wait until the eggs are pure white and the yolk has a little bit of a skin over it.  Flip the egg over with a spatula gently.  After a minute or two, flip it over again gently.  Make toast to sweep up the yolk if you like.
